landing.hero_title: Transparent Funding, One Voice at a Time
landing.hero_subtitle: Browse campaigns, watch transparency videos, donate by voice, with blockchain-verified receipts and field agent verification.
landing.showcase_subtitle: Watch transparency videos, track progress, and see real impact from verified campaigns.
landing.step1_desc: Search campaigns by voice or browse by category. Works in English & Amharic.
landing.step2_desc: Watch transparency videos and GPS-verified field reports from the ground.
landing.step3_desc: Pay via Stripe, M-Pesa, or crypto. Receive blockchain tax receipts.
landing.step4_desc: Field agents submit photo + GPS verification. See your donation's real impact.
landing.features_subtitle: Everything you need — whether you're a donor, NGO, campaign creator, field agent, or admin.
landing.feat_campaigns_desc: Search and browse active campaigns with voice search support.
landing.feat_analytics_desc: Real-time metrics, conversation analytics, and donation funnels.
landing.feat_admin_desc: Approve NGOs, manage users, review payouts, and platform stats.
landing.feat_donate_desc: Donate securely with Stripe, M-Pesa, or crypto — by voice or form.
landing.feat_ngo_desc: Voice-guided organization registration with step-by-step wizard.
landing.feat_create_desc: Voice-guided campaign creation with video upload and GPS tagging.
landing.feat_field_desc: Submit photo + GPS verification reports. Earn $30 per approved verification.
landing.tester_desc: Explore all platform features — register an NGO, create a campaign, make a donation, or submit a field verification.
